name: Distance
description: You mostly need glasses to see things in the distance, e.g. whilst driving.

name: Reading
description: You mostly need glasses to see things up close, e.g. papers, documents, etc.

name: Computer
description: You need glasses when using a computer or anything else at arm's length.

name: BiFocal
description: You need glasses to see things up close and in the distance. Bifocal lenses have a visible line separating the near and far distance viewing areas.

name: Verifocal
description: You need glasses to see things up close and in the distance. Varifocal lenses offer a smooth, continuous vision from distance to intermediate to near vision.

name: Advance Verifocal
description: You mostly need glasses to see things in the distance, e.g. whilst driving.

name: Ultra Verifocal
description: You mostly need glasses to see things in the distance, e.g. whilst driving.
